content: TWO suggestions: - your SMTP settings does not specify STARTTLS - that is what the error message is stating - I also suggest you put complete email address for user name, not just the part to left of @
creator: davidsk

content: If this was an IMAP account, your messages are still on the original server. My guess is you changed the domain and also the web host. More information may help.
